ðŸ“– Summary: AudioGhost AI is a desktop application that uses AI to separate or extract specific sounds from audio or video files based on natural language descriptions. It leverages a memory-optimized version of Meta's SAM-Audio model and provides a modern user interface with real-time progress and audio mixing capabilities.
